alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Central Walton; Gadsden; Holmes; Inland Bay; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Inland Jefferson; Jackson; Leon; North Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued December 02 at 2:57PM EST until further notice by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Alabama, including the following areas, Coffee, Dale, Geneva, Henry and Houston, Florida, including the following areas, Calhoun, Central Walton, Coastal Bay, Coastal Gulf, Gadsden, Holmes, Inland Bay, Inland Franklin, Inland Gulf, Inland Jefferson, Inland Wakulla, Jackson, Leon, Liberty, Madison, North Walton, South Walton and Washington, and Georgia, including the following areas, Brooks, Decatur, Grady, Lowndes, Seminole and Thomas. * WHEN...Through Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Low-water crossings may be flooded. Extensive street flooding and flooding of creeks and rivers are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - 3 to 5 inches of rain has fallen today in a large area along and south of a line from Panama City to Blountstown to Thomasville, all the way down to the Forgotten Coast. An additional inch or two of rain is forecast this evening, with local amounts to three inches. It would not take much additional rain to cause new flooding. Other areas within the watch will see a few hours of moderate to possibly heavy rain through this evening, including southeast Alabama. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Central Walton; Gadsden; Holmes; Inland Bay; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Inland Jefferson; Jackson; Leon; North Walton; Washington
